name: Infam
description: Infam platform will be a whole analytical rating platform with own token. Platform will help builds clean relationships between partners, without theft and fraud. We sure, that's only one way to make crypto market more clear and stronger. Influencers and ambassadors also looking for interesting projects. They really worry to make mistakes advertising scams, they don't wanna lose reputation, which is the most important thing for them. Also they can make extra money from platform with orders for deferents development. Influencers and ambassadors will can choose a project to each region, using filters. For the user, this is an opportunity to be in an environmentally friendly environment and find great projects for himself, while participating in the life of the platform, performing actions and developing, receiving remuneration and additional income for this.
